0.title: tomo
0.content: sina wile pali e lipu+suli sama ni anu seme? sina ken! . sina wile la, o lukin e lipu [_nasin]. sina jo ala e sona+mute pi+++lipu sama ni la o lukin e lipu [_sona]. You too can have an online book in sitelen pona! See the English page: EN .

1.title: EN
1.content: Essentially, all you need to do is fork this repository and update the _config.yml file with the correct information about your repository. This repository is a fork of Jekyll GH Actions Quickstart. After that all I did was add the linja pona font file to the top level and a _sass/custom/custom.scss file. For more information, see these links: . | Jekyll GH Actions Quickstart | Just the Docs documentation | .

2.title: nasin
2.content: sina ken kama jo e lipu+suli sama ni kepeken nasin seme? . | o tawa lipu ni. o kepeken ilo o kepeken ilo [_pali_ona] (Fork) | o ante e lipu pi++nasin ilo (_config.yml). o kepeken nimi pi+ma [_kepeken_ilo_tan_ale] (Github) sina e nimi pi+ma pi+lipu+suli sina. | .

3.title: sona
3.content: sina wile e sona+mutepi++nasin sitelen [_ma_tan] (Markdown) anu nasin lukin nila o kepeken linja+wawa ni: . | .
